title: The Tragically Hip - Discography (1987-2012) - MP3/320
description:
The Tragically Hip - Discography 1987-2012 (fifteen albums)

MP3/320  

--All albums ripped from disc or converted from FLAC--

Thanks to Kitlope for making the albums marked by an asterisk in the list below available in FLAC, providing the source for conversion to high-quality MP3. The rest of the albums are from my own collection.
